results.name: a(n) = (n+1)*(2*n+1)*(3*n+1)*(4*n+1).
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
maple: seq( mul(j*n+1, j=1..4), n=0..30); # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
program: (MAGMA) [&*[s*n+1: s in [1..4]]: n in [0..25]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, May 23 2011
(Sage) [product(j*n+1 for j in (1..4)) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2020
